thread.title: Nick Edwards
thread.title_full: North West Motorcycles Direct reviewed by Nick Edwards

author: Nick Edwards
title: Nick Edwards
text:
Just had to share my recent experience with this company, I had been trying to purchase one of these helmets since January, I had originally placed an order with a rival company but after many phone calls and no success plus the delivery date getting pushed back to April I started looking elsewhere, I came across North West Motorcycles Direct and rang them to see if they could help, they said they could and promised the helmet would be with me in 2 days, true to their word it arrived when they said with no issue.
I would recommend them to anybody, customer service is great and they deliver on their promises
